[2026-02-20 05:09:07] ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
`★ Insight ─────────────────────────────────────`
**Review-driven quality**: The code review caught a subtle but important pattern — the duplicated `FREQUENCY_LABELS` across 3 files. In a server-only/client component split architecture (Next.js App Router), you can't import constants from a `"server-only"` module into `"use client"` components. The fix was a shared constants file without the `server-only` import, which both sides can use. This is a common pitfall in Next.js App Router codebases.

**Controlled vs uncontrolled AlertDialog**: The review also caught that uncontrolled Radix AlertDialog always closes on action click, making loading states invisible and error handling awkward. Converting to controlled `open`/`onOpenChange` state gives the component full control over when the dialog dismisses.
`─────────────────────────────────────────────────`

**Epic 121A complete.** PR #245 merged to main.

| **Review fixes** | Shared constants file, controlled AlertDialog, console.error in catch blocks, extracted select className |
| **Status** | All 4 task locations updated |
